I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, examine the repository structure
2. Look at the pom.xml files to understand the Maven configuration
3. Update Java version in pom.xml files
4. Check for any Java 8 specific code that needs updating
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to test the migration
6. Fix any issues that arise
